data.text: The @UN is right: Japan has to reform its hostage justice system. NGOs, lawyers, scholars, citizens are mobilized and it is time for the government to listen to them and take action. #HumanRights @hrc @UNHumanRights @CommissionerHR https://t.co/VhOwSWKJx4

My response to recent comments by Japan’s Justice Minister Masako Mori in the FT.
https://t.co/0KomdnPSF1

何が起きているのか真実をお話しする準備をしています。
4月11日木曜日に記者会見をします。
I'm getting ready to tell the truth about what's happening.  Press conference on Thursday, April 11.

users.description: Father, Husband, Former Chairman and CEO of Nissan Motor, Renault, Former Chairman of Mitsubishi Motors, Former Chairman and CEO of the Alliance.
users.name: Carlos Ghosn カルロス・ゴーン

users.description: HRC is the nation’s largest LGBTQ+ civil rights organization. We envision a world where LGBTQ+ people are ensured equality at home, at work & in every community
